preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 15.85 g of Silver (Ag). 
 2. Weigh out 158.76 g of Barium (Ba). 
 3. Weigh out 250.34 g of Silicon (Si). 
 4. Combine all three materials in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 5. Use a pestle and mortar to grind the mixture into a fine powder to ensure uniformity.
